DataElement.preferredName: Attitudes and Preferences Questionnaire You and Your Doctor's Cancer Treatment Decision Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of the method that their doctor and they decided about their cancer treatment, using a five-point Likert scale.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Attitudes and Preferences Questionnaire Patient and Doctor Decision 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A five point ordered reference standard that describes a patient's decision making process regarding their cancer treatment using the Attitudes and Preferences Questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.value: My doctor made the final decision about which treatment will be used but seriously considered my opinion.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Doctor Made Final Decision About Which Treatment Will Be Used but Seriously Considered My Opinion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Doctor Made Final Decision About Which Treatment Will Be Used but Seriously Considered My Opinion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's doctor made the final decision about which treatment will be used but seriously considered their opinion.

Concepts.longName: Doctor Made Final Decision About Which Treatment Will Be Used but Seriously Considered My Opinion
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's doctor made the final decision about which treatment will be used but seriously considered their opinion.

PermissibleValues.value: My doctor and I shared responsibility for deciding which treatment is best for me.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Doctor and I Shared Responsibility for Deciding Which Treatment is Best for Me

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Doctor and I Shared Responsibility for Deciding Which Treatment is Best for Me
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual and their doctor shared responsibility for deciding which treatment is best for them.

Concepts.longName: Doctor and I Shared Responsibility for Deciding Which Treatment is Best for Me
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual and their doctor shared responsibility for deciding which treatment is best for them.

PermissibleValues.value: I made the final selection of my treatment after seriously considering my doctor's opinion.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Made Final Selection of My Treatment After Seriously Considering Doctor's Opinion

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Made Final Selection of My Treatment After Seriously Considering Doctor's Opinion
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual made the final selection of their treatment after seriously considering their doctor's opinion.

Concepts.longName: Made Final Selection of My Treatment After Seriously Considering Doctor's Opinion
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual made the final selection of their treatment after seriously considering their doctor's opinion.

PermissibleValues.value: I made the final selection about which treatment I will receive.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Made Final Selection About Which Treatment I Will Receive

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Made Final Selection About Which Treatment I Will Receive
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual made the final selection about which treatment they will receive.

Concepts.longName: Made Final Selection About Which Treatment I Will Receive
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual made the final selection about which treatment they will receive.

PermissibleValues.value: I left all decisions regarding my treatment to my doctor.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Left All Decisions Regarding My Treatment to My Doctor

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Left All Decisions Regarding My Treatment to My Doctor
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual left all decisions about treatment to their doctor.

Concepts.longName: Left All Decisions Regarding My Treatment to My Doctor
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual left all decisions about treatment to their doctor.
